summary: Documented all login URLs for different roles (Admin, Admin Employee, Vendor, Vendor Employee) and API endpoints (Customer, Vendor, Delivery Man). Identified that login URLs are stored in data_settings table and the route uses pattern /login/{tab} where {tab} must match database values. Created BEAUTY_MODULE_LOGIN_URLS.md with complete login information, troubleshooting steps, and instructions for changing URLs.
current_status: Login URLs documented. Default URLs are: /login/admin (admin), /login/admin-employee (admin employee), /login/vendor (vendor), /login/vendor-employee (vendor employee). If 404 error occurs, check database values match the URL being accessed.
